attributes.action: Implement a daily "Road Tax" levy on foreign registered goods vehicles entering the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To charge foreign goods vehicles entering the UK a "daily tax" (ie £15/20) to help contribute to cost of maintaining the UK road structure. This would also help to level "the playing field" between foreign & UK hauliers competing for contracts within the UK. It would help to reverse the decline of the UK haulage industry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
